title: Ginga Sengoku Gun Yuuden Rai
alternative_title: Ginga Sengoku Gunyuuden Rai, Ginga Sengoku Gun Yuuden Rai, Galaxy Warring State Chronicle Rai, Rai: Galactic Civil War Chronicle, Thunder Jet, 銀河戦国群雄伝ライ
description: Rai is a space opera that fuses feudal Chinese and Japanese customs with vast galaxy spanning empires and space-going societies. The story follows the life and times of the samurai Rai, and the quest of several spacefaring factions for control of territory and, of course, the Empire.
